cobblemon.species.godbidoof.name: Bidoof
cobblemon.species.godbidoof.desc1: Bidoof, the divine master of chaos and creation, rules with unmatched mischief and an unwavering loyalty that shapes the very world around it.
cobblemon.species.godbidoof.desc2: In all the heavens and the earth, I alone am The Honored One -Bidoof
